item.title: Hydraulic Quantity Indications – Hydraulic “SYS FAULT” Light Operative

numlitem.para: Associated reservoir level is verified normal before each departure,
Associated system pressure indication is verified to be operative, and
Associated hydraulic SYS FAULT light is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "___ HYD QTY IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)
